column2: "Nna Levifo egyanom efiefi mu etsitsir no baa ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column4: nye Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu egyanom efiefi mu etsitsir no hɔ;"

column2: "na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ Siloh wɔ Keenan asaase do
column4: EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmma hɛn nkurow ma yɛntsena mu
column5: ɔnye no ho mfikyisaase mma hɛn fiembowa."

column2: "Na Israelmba no dze hɔn egyapadze no mu nkurow bi nye no ho mfikyisaase maa Levifo no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm no tse."

column2: "Na kyɛfa no bae maa Kohatfo ebusua ebusua
column3: na ɔsɔfo Aaronmba no a wofi Levifo mu no
column4: nam tontotwe do nyae fii Juda
column5: Simeon nye Benjamin ebusuakuw mu nkurow duebiasa."

column2: "Na Kohatmba nkaa no nam tontotwe do nyae fii Efraim
column4: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no mu nkurow du."

column2: "Na Gersonmba no nam tontotwe do nyae fii Isakar
column5: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no a ɔwɔ Basan no mu

column2: "Merarimba dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee nyaa Reuben
column4: nye Zebulun ebusuakuw mu nkurow duebien."

column2: "Na Israelmba no nam tontotwe do dze nkurow yi nye no ho mfikyisaase maa Levifo no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do hyɛe no."

column3: nye Simeonmba ebusuakuw mu nkurow a wɔabobɔ edzin yi mae:"

column2: "na ɔwɔ hɔ ma Aaronmba a wofi Kohat ebusua ebusua mu a wɔwɔ Levimba mu no: na hɔndze nye kyɛfa a odzi kan no."

column3: Arba no a ɔyɛ Anak n’egya no
column5: wɔ Juda nkokodo nkurow no mu
column6: ɔnye no ho mfikyisaase a etwa ho ehyia no."

column4: wɔdze maa Jefune babanyin Kaleb dɛ n’enyadze."
na Bɛt-semes nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; ebusuakuw ebien no mu nkurow akron."

column2: "Na Benjamin ebusuakuw mu dze nye Gibeon

column3: na Almon nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow anan."

column4: hɔn nkurow nyinara yɛ nkurow duebiasa nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase."

column6: wonyaa hɔn kyɛfa nkurow fi Efraim ebusuakuw mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze onyimpakumfo guansumabew kurow Sekem nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu maa hɔn

column3: Bɛt-horon nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow anan."
nye Gat-rimmon nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow anan."

column2: "Na Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no mu dze
column3: Taanak nye Gat-rimmon nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow ebien."

column2: "Nkurow a ɔyɛ Kohatmba nkaa no hɔn ebusua ebusua no dze nyinara yɛ du nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase."
"Na Gersonmba a wofi Levi ebusua ebusua no mu no
column3: wɔmaa hɔn Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no mu onyimpakumfo guansumabew kurow Golan wɔ Basan; nye Be-estera nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow ebien."
nye En-gannim nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow anan."

column2: "Helkat nye Rehob nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase

column3: onyimpakumfo guansumabew kurow Kedes wɔ Galilii
column5: Hamot-dor nye Kartan nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow ebiasa."

column2: "Gersonfo nkurow nyinara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee yɛ nkurow duebiasa nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase."

column9: nye Nahalal nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow anan."

column7: nye Mefaat nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; nkurow anan."

column3: onyimpakumfo guansumabew kurow Ramot wɔ Gilead ɔnye no ho mfikyisaase
nye Jazer nye hɔn ho mfikyisaase; ne nyinara yɛ nkurow anan."

column2: "Iyi nyinara nye Merarimba nkurow dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
column3: mekyerɛ Levifo ebusua ebusua nkaa no; na hɔn kyɛfa yɛ nkurow duebien."

column2: "Levifo nkurow a ɔwɔ Israelmba hɔn enyadze mu nyinara yɛ nkurow eduanan awɔtwe nye no ho mfikyisaase."
"Nkurow yi nyinara wowɔ mfikyisaase a abobɔ ho aprɔw: na nkurow yi nyinara mbrɛ ɔtsetsee ara nye no."
"Nna EWURADZE dze asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam dɛ ɔdze bɛma hom egyanom no nyinara maa Israel; na wɔfae

column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom no nyinara: na hɔn atamfo nyinara mu obiara enntum enngyina hɔn enyim; EWURADZE yii hɔn atamfo nyinara hyɛɛ hɔn nsa."

column2: "Asɛm papa biara a EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Israelfo no mu biribiara anntɔ famu: ne nyinara baa mu."
